data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Zanzibar South and Central, Tanzania, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zanzibar South and Central, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Zanzibar South and Central, Tanzania today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 12,704 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Zanzibar South and Central.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Swahili, Tumbatu people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 12,704 believers in Zanzibar South and Central.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Zanzibar South and Central to agree with you and with one another.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zanzibar South and Central, Tanzania has a population of 115,600.

We estimate Zanzibar South and Central has 12,704 people who might know Jesus, 46,383 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 56,512 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Zanzibar South and Central, Tanzania to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
